name: MEMORY BACK UP
description:
Berlin mini game jam entry

---

RUN YOU TINY BIT

RUN FROM THAT EVIL LOADING BAR

DON'T GET STUCK IN THAT DATA PROCESSING

RUN AND SAVE YOUR LIFE

---

CONTROLS :

SPACE TO START

ARROW KEY TO MOVE (SPAM THEM TO MOVE FASTER)
